email_text:
Subject: Important Student Loan Forgiveness Program Update

Dear Student Loan Borrower,

We are reaching out to inform you of an important update regarding your student loans. As part of the Department of Education's new loan forgiveness program, you may be eligible to have a portion of your student loans forgiven.

To qualify for this program, all you need to do is provide us with some basic information to verify your identity and loan details. Once we have confirmed your eligibility, we will work with your loan servicer to have a portion of your loans forgiven.

This program is a great opportunity for you to reduce your student loan debt and move towards financial freedom. Don't miss out on this chance to take control of your finances and achieve your goals.

Please click on the link below to fill out the form and begin the loan forgiveness process:

[Phishing link]

If you have any questions or need assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us. We are here to help you every step of the way.

Thank you for your attention to this important matter.

Sincerely,

Dept. of Education Loan Forgiveness Program Team
